duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing hiring plans for FOH & BOH staff and creating job descriptions.
Providing support and guidance to HR recruiters, management, and other staff.
Processing payroll on a bi-weekly basis and addressing employee payroll issues.
Managing talent acquisition process, including recruitment, interviewing, and hiring of qualified job applicants.
Analyzing trends in compensation and benefits and proposing competitive base and incentive pay programs.
Overseeing employee incident reports and investigations.
Maintaining compliance with federal, state, and local employment laws and regulations.
Leading talent acquisition, employee career development, succession planning, retention programs, training, and leadership development.
Functioning as a strategic, human capital business advisor to the senior management team.
Developing initiatives, policies, and programs to complement existing practices and create consistency across the organization.
Overseeing benefit and compensation plans to ensure cost efficiencies and attractiveness to retain top talent.
Maintaining knowledge of trends, best practices, regulatory changes, and new technologies in human resources, talent management, and employment law.

education_certification.credential: BSc in Human Resources, Organizational Psychology or similar field.
